headline: Assessing Electronic Arts (EA) Valuation As Shares Trade Slightly Above Narrative Fair Value
summary: Why Electronic Arts stock is back on investors’ radar Electronic Arts (EA) stock is drawing attention after recent trading, with the share price around $204.25 and a mixed pattern of short term returns that contrasts with its longer term performance profile. See our latest analysis for Electronic Arts. Recent trading has been fairly steady, with only small short term share price moves. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of 43.24% and 3 year total shareholder return of 62.82% point...
